title: Frost Bite
about: Buster V. brings us another ironic adventure full of intrigue.  Test your wits?

chapters.title: It all starts here.
chapters.prose: This is where it all starts.  Blah blah blah...

chapters.title: You win!
chapters.prose: You must be a genius.  Or maybe you just got lucky...

chapters.title: You lose.
chapters.prose: That's too bad, but didn't you notice you always make the wrong decisions?  Next time, stay home.

author: e49a7252-acbc-4ca8-976c-17624fea822c
title: Frost Bite
tagLine: Is it me, or is it getting cold in here?
about: Buster V. brings us another ironic adventure full of intrigue.  Test your wits and stay warm?

chapters.title: It all starts here.

chapters.title: You win!
chapters.prose: You must be a genius.  Or maybe you just got lucky...

chapters.title: A Surprising New Twist
chapters.prose: You wonder what's in store.  Now decide which way to go and you'll find out.

chapters.title: You win big.
chapters.prose: Wow!  Who knew you would make the call.  It's so unlike you.

chapters.title: You lose.
chapters.prose: That's too bad, but didn't you notice you always make the wrong decisions?  Next time, stay home.

author: 64f0be1c-c2a9-40d9-96fb-820aac3a4099
title: Punchy Whale
about: This is the challenge you have been searching for.  Will you be able to find the prize?

chapters.title: Humble Beginnings
chapters.prose: Little Johnny thought he at the start of yet another humdrum day at the Bartlet academy for average children.  Little did he know that his day was about to be wrecked by a careless reader.

signpost.teaser: Make Johnny skip school and go to the arcade.

chapters.title: Johnny Goes to School.
chapters.prose: Yup, this is definitely going to be one of those normal, ordinary days.

author: e49a7252-acbc-4ca8-976c-17624fea822c
title: Bring Home the Bacon
about: Your family is starving, literally.  You need to do something fast, but you also need to survive.
